localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Building remote teams requires trust, async collaboration, remote support and an understanding of context and culture for other team members. We are the first remote jobs platform to make these a key part of the conversation between candidates and employers.
nodes.title: Remotely - Find where you want to work based on time, location and team
nodes.author: Tristan Pollock

nodes.excerpt: Build group coaching programs with agendas, goals, worksheets, community, and client management in one place. Coaching is about making change happen, through encouragement, accountability, collaboration, and expertise.
nodes.title: upcoach - The platform to scale your group, cohort, or 1-on-1 coaching
nodes.author: Matic Uzmah

nodes.excerpt: LEADx does for leadership coaching what Duolingo did for learning a new language. Bite-sized content that can fit into a few minutes of free time. Nudges and reminders about topics you recently learned. Guided coaching on topics that matter to you right now.
nodes.title: LEADx - Coaching for next-gen leaders
nodes.author: Lucas Carlson

nodes.excerpt: Your personal shopping companion with integrated recipes, loyalty cards and shopping suggestions â€“ Get the brand new version 4.0.0 of the all-in-one shopping list app now for free! Available for iOS, Android, web, voice and smartwatch & tablet!
nodes.title: Bring! - The simplest shopping list for sharing
nodes.author: Robin

nodes.excerpt: Recast by Amplication is an open-source tool that generates TypeScript Node.js backend and a React client based on Excel schema. It includes a GraphQL and REST API, identity management, logging utility, error handler, and a React admin UI.
nodes.title: Recast by Amplication - Convert Excel Sheet to a TypeScript Node.js API
nodes.author: Yuval Hazaz

nodes.excerpt: With more meetings than ever taking place over Zoom, Skype, and other online conference platforms the need for them to look as professional as possible is a real one. Background.live is a remarkable new resource providing virtual background images for free.
nodes.title: Virtual Background Images - Free virtual background images for online meetings
nodes.author: Hannu Sehm

nodes.excerpt: ğŸ’… Polish is a tool for UX writers. It turns your browser into a powerful writing tool. Edit text on any webpage, test, and iterate until you get it just right. Ideate, test, and capture copy changes quickly and in context!
nodes.title: Polish - Turn your browser into a powerful UX writing tool!
nodes.author: Jonathon Colman

nodes.excerpt: Weekly live video podcast + newsletter + Discord + Learn new community tools and trends from makers + Hang out with community builders, developer advocates, streamers, and creators who embrace the passion economy https://devrelevents.substack.com/ph66
nodes.title: The Communities Show - Come for the podcast & stay for the community
nodes.author: Rick Turoczy

nodes.excerpt: Upstream redefines professional networking with products designed for organic interactions and life-changing connections. Upstream for Web allows users to join any community and attend any Upstream event from your computer.
nodes.title: Upstream for Web - The next generation professional networking platform
nodes.author: Alexander Taub

nodes.excerpt: Imagine is a smart code generator for your appâ€™s backend. Add your app settings & data models via a simple UI and instantly generate high-quality Django/Node code (including REST/GraphQL APIs & tests) that you can download & customize. Free & no signup needed.
nodes.title: Imagine - Instantly generate Django & Node source code for your app
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Mayday is a new kind of calendar, built for busy people. It automates scheduling based on your True Availability, intelligently blocks out time to focus, and helps to optimize your week. Take control of your schedule and spend time in more meaningful ways.
nodes.title: Mayday - A calendar designed to help you spend time better
nodes.author: Jeremy Bell

nodes.excerpt: Calendly is your hub for scheduling meetings efficiently, eliminating the hassle of back-and-forth emails so you can get back to work. We uncomplicate scheduling by only offering times that work with your availability. Used by millions worldwide.
nodes.title: Calendly 2.0 - Easily schedule meetings without the back-and-forth emails
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: The Meeshkan Chrome extension enables no-code test writing for any webapp, so that anyone can write a test case in seconds. Spend less time writing tests, more time creating brilliant products, and feel confident that every merge will delight your users.
nodes.title: Meeshkan Recorder - The fastest way to write & manage UI tests
nodes.author: Makenna Smutz

nodes.excerpt: Feedio enables product managers to centrally manage feature requests coming in from clients, and internal teams. Additionally, it allows you to make sense of what creates most value for your clients and notifies them when you ship those features.
nodes.title: Feedio - Easiest way to manage feature requests
nodes.author: Aniket Jain

nodes.excerpt: Free access to open banking data in Europe. Connections to major European banks in 31 countries. 90-day continues access to accounts. Private and Business account data. Free forever.
nodes.title: Nordigen - Free open banking API
nodes.author: Rolands Mesters

nodes.excerpt: Show a progress bar on your Twitter profile picture. Track your progress, make yourself accountable, or just have some fun! Show progress to: - The next 10, 100, 1k, 10k followers - An exact followers goal - A custom milestone using your bio!
nodes.title: Black Magic - Show a progress bar on your Twitter profile picture

nodes.title: Miventure - Robinhood for startup investing
nodes.author: Luiggi Pera
